subject: Football
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
College Athletics
Football (College)
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department has asked the N.C.A.A. in a letter why it does not have a playoff system in college football’s top level and said there were “serious questions” about whether the format to determine a champion complies with antitrust laws.
